author: John Strongarm
content: So far I have used three copies of the second version (non VC) of this lens. All three now and then needed a reset by turning the camera off and on. I find this very annoying and appareantly Tamron hasn't solved this problem. To me it's a real showstopper. Even the cheapest Nikon 18-55 VR (79 euro) never fails like this. Maybe the Sigma equivalent is better?
